_source.short_desc: Getting data just got... fun? Typeforms are fun to take and easy to make, and plug into your favorite apps with 120+ integrations.
_source.long_desc: Automate data collection, scale it, and do it all in style. 95% of users get more data, more easily when they switch to Typeform. Our design-forward, fully customizable and interactive forms make collecting data a breeze, all protected with enterprise-grade security. Over 120 powerful integrations send data wherever you need it automatically, so it'll fit right into your workflow. No coding or onboarding needed: it's quick and easy to get started.
_source.pricing_details:
Free Plan: free to collect 100 responses per month with typeforms of up to 10 fields.

Basic: $29/month (or $25/month when billed annually) to collect up to 100 responses from unlimited typeforms.

Plus: $59/month (or $50/month when billed annually) to collect up to 1,000 responses from unlimited typeforms + everything in Basic, remove Typeform branding, custom domain, and more.

Business: starting at $99/month (or $83/month when billed annually) to collect up to 10,000 responses from unlimited typeforms + everything in Plus, drop-off rates, priority support, and more.

Other paid plan features include Logic Jumps, respondent email notifications, hidden fields, and online payment collection.
_source.target_audience: SMBs, Large Enterprises, Design Enthusiasts, NGOs, Market Research Companies, Freelancers

category_features.definition: Detects when a user has input/keyed data incorrectly

category_features.definition: Detects variations in pronunciation or variations in spelling across regions.

category_features.definition: Two-way actions and data sharing between several users in real time

category_features.definition: Create or build customized tests and quizzes

category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

related_products.short_desc: Collect, organize, and manage your data in a collaborative, all-in-one workspace with Jotform.
related_products.features: Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to seamless data management for your business. Jotform is a powerful online Form Builder that makes it easy to collect data online and send it wherever you want. Store and organize submissions in a configurable spreadsheet-database hybrid via Jotform Tables to keep all your form data in one place. You can even integrate with 100+ apps to sync responses to your other online accounts, such as Google Sheets, Dropbox, Airtable, and more.

related_products.short_desc: UiPath caters to companies from all industries wanting to easily automate their web, SAP and Citrix-based business processes.
related_products.features: UiPath RPA is a high-level platform dedicated to providing seamless automation of data entry on any web form & desktop application. It supports Excel and provides SAP and Citrix integration. Start easy and fast with the built-in recorder that reads and replays your actions on the screen. Saving countless man-hours and requiring zero coding or scripting, UiPath offers 100% playback accuracy and is technology agnostic, working with HTML, Flash, AJAX, PDF, Java and Silverlight.

related_products.short_desc: Getting data just got... fun? Typeforms are fun to take and easy to make, and plug into your favorite apps with 120+ integrations.
related_products.features: Automate data collection, scale it, and do it all in style. 95% of users get more data, more easily when they switch to Typeform. Our design-forward, fully customizable and interactive forms make collecting data a breeze, all protected with enterprise-grade security. Over 120 powerful integrations send data wherever you need it automatically, so it'll fit right into your workflow. No coding or onboarding needed: it's quick and easy to get started.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based automated data entry platform that allows users to upload documents, extract data, auto-publish, and more.
related_products.features: Eliminate manual data entry to simplify your bookkeeping tasks and unlock time savings. Integrates with multiple accounting solutions, including Quickbooks, Xero, Sage, Kashflow, Fuzemetrix and more.

related_products.short_desc: Wufoo makes it easy to create custom online forms so you can collect data, RSVPs, payments and more, all without writing code.
related_products.features: Wufoo makes it easy to create custom online forms so you can collect data, RSVPs, payments and more, all without writing a single line of code. Trusted by more than 3 million users, including companies like Amazon & Disney, Wufoo has an award-winning form builder interface, easy customization, 400+ templates and reporting! Whether you're embedding your forms on your website, or sharing a direct link, Wufoo has you covered.

related_products.short_desc: Empower field technicians to collect rich and reliable data on their mobile devices. Give techs vital context and intelligence.
related_products.features: Data entry for field technicians has never been easier. Our no-code field team platform enables you to build intuitive custom apps that adapt as information is inputted. Empower techs to collect rich data, reliably and in real-time, on their mobile devices, even without network connectivity. Send captured data back to the office instantly with seamless integration to any cloud service or business system. Interconnect your organization from the field, to operations & IT.

related_products.short_desc: Autocomplete words and sentences and quickly recall your frequently typed phrases and create standardized documents in a few clicks.
related_products.features:
PhraseExpander can significantly speed up your data entry tasks by giving you access to fill-in-the-blanks forms that you can pull up by typing an abbreviation.
It also provides autocompletion and autocorrections in any application.
Forget copying and pasting data from Word. All your common phrases and templates are immediately accessible by the touch of a button.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile app for completing inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks. Easy to use, enterprise grade.
related_products.features:
Forms On Fire is your mobile app for accurate inspections, audits, safety reports, orders, and many other tasks.

Save time with pre-filled fields using data from your systems. Save time by eliminating travel back to the office. Save 100% of the time it takes to re-enter, re-assemble, file, and distribute forms to those who need them.

With enterprise-grade security, connections to thousands of systems, and ridiculously helpful customer service, you will delight your management team.

related_products.short_desc: Make sales as easy as email. Sync your calendar & emails with Salesforce, track emails, schedule appointments, set follow-ups & more!
related_products.features:
You work in your inbox, not in Salesforce. No one has to force you to use email. It's easy to use and effective. We think Salesforce should be just as useful and just as simple.

That's why we bring Salesforce into the inbox. To save you time and make you more productive.

Now you can see and update Salesforce as you work. Sync emails to Salesforce, track email opens, create and update Salesforce records, schedule calls and much more.

Try Cirrus Insight free for 14 days!

related_products.short_desc: Your Business Data OS: Collect, organize & understand your data.
related_products.features: Stop migrating your data from one tool to another! Formaloo helps you collect data through forms & surveys, and then organize it with powerful tools you can build with no code. Use the charts, tables, kanban, live presentations, and more to visualize and organize your data. Manage access in your teams and enjoy! Happy formaloo-ing!

related_products.short_desc: The easiest way to keep your contacts up-to-date & centralized in your address book or CRM, automatically. Now FREE for individuals!
related_products.features:
Imagine your current & past contacts, directly from your emails & LinkedIn scouting, always complete and up-to-date in your address book or CRM, automatically! Save time and lost contacts, as no phone numbers, emails or business info is left unsaved or out-of-date, with no need to spend hours on manual input.
 
So you can spend your valuable time reaching out to your network, instead of searching through emails for the right contact details! FREE ongoing individual service & FREE team trial!

similar_products.short_desc: An intelligent automated order processing solution. Manages your emailed purchase orders from inbox through to ERP integration.
similar_products.features:
Instantly turn PDF purchase orders into sales orders in your ERP.

An incredibly fast and scalable solution, Lucy automation handles the PDF orders your customers send via email. 

Around the clock, emails are opened, purchase orders are read, and sales orders are created in your ERP. Ready to pick, pack, and ship in seconds. No errors, no down time, no late orders, no overtime.

similar_products.short_desc: FastField is an extremely flexible mobile forms solution to collect data and automate your digital forms workflow.
similar_products.features: FastField is a mobile forms automation solution for efficient and accurate data collection. FastField allows for offline data capture to achieve a completely paperless workflow. Build highly customizable digital forms for Android, iOS and Web without any prior coding experience. FastField is ideal for audits, inspections, safety reports, and any other custom business forms. With FastField you can integrate proprietary data to pre-populate forms and automatically deliver custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Empower field technicians to collect rich and reliable data on their mobile devices. Give techs vital context and intelligence.
similar_products.features: Data entry for field technicians has never been easier. Our no-code field team platform enables you to build intuitive custom apps that adapt as information is inputted. Empower techs to collect rich data, reliably and in real-time, on their mobile devices, even without network connectivity. Send captured data back to the office instantly with seamless integration to any cloud service or business system. Interconnect your organization from the field, to operations & IT.

similar_products.short_desc: Whether you receive invoices, purchase orders, claims, any other documents, Rossum automates your business communication.
similar_products.features:
Rossum is an AI-based cloud document gateway for automated business communication. Rossum solves four key steps in document-based processes at once: receiving documents across multiple channels, automated understanding, two-way communication to resolve exceptions, and acting on the data using in-depth integrations. 

ISO 27001 certified and HIPAA compliant, Rossum is trusted by: Pepsico, Veolia, Siemens, Cushman & Wakefield, and other companies that prefer to build rather than type.

similar_products.short_desc: Highly configurable web app builder with both a spreadsheet and form UI. Quickly design and implement solutions end users will love.
similar_products.features: Intellimas is a highly configurable, enterprise level solution with spreadsheet features that is deployed in the cloud or on-premise. Build a variety of web applications that end users will love. Intellimas is built for fast data entry, analytics, exception management, and easy retrieval of live data from other systems. The grid UI allows for an easy transition from spreadsheets. This comprehensive view, along with our new form view, provide you with flexibility to handle unlimited end uses.

similar_products.short_desc: Think about it. Build it. Kintone's visual application builder lets you create and customize enterprise apps, zero coding required.
similar_products.features: Spreadsheets are so last century. Kintone's visual application builder lets you convert your inefficient, static spreadsheets into dynamic, custom databases in a snap, zero coding required. As live databases, your data can do so much more, from creating custom reports with one click to triggering action-packed workflows that improve team collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: Fluix is a platform to streamline the document flow and communication between your mobile workforce, customers and back office.
similar_products.features:
IDEAL FOR FIELD TEAMS (>10+ USERS): with Fluix mobile platform your field team can fill out checklists and submit work orders, sign contracts and capture customer signatures, approve purchase orders and perform audits. With automated workflow rules, your back office can collect field data and analyze it in real time. 

Fluix can be accessed through its native app for iOS, or any web browser.
Help you team become more productive and make your business more efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: Eliminate paperwork, improve data quality and increase efficiency with mobile forms for business data collection and delivery.
similar_products.features: Device Magic is a mobile forms app that replaces unreliable paper forms with smarter, richer data collection. Your teams can easily complete forms anywhere, anytime - even offline. Deliver accurate data from the field to the office in real-time, and alert specific team members of critical issues.  Deliver data in whatever format you choose, and integrate directly into your existing systems to eliminate data re-entry.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Database Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Management software stores data in a structured format so it can be easily managed and retrieved. These applications allow greater ability to manage, manipulate and combine disparate data from multiple non-relational sources. By combining an integrated, enterprise-wide data access point with the capability for extensive search, manipulation and reporting functions, Database Management solutions enable organizations to make better, broader and more efficient use of key data. Database Management software is related to Business Continuity software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top ETL software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of ETL tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: ETL, or Extract, Transform and Load, software enables data migration between different systems. First, data is extracted from the original data source; next, it is converted to the format appropriate for the target system; lastly, the data is loaded to the new system. ETL software is used in data integration and master data management processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top RDBMS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of RDBMS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Relational Database Management System (RDBMS) is a database where all data is represented in sequences that are in turn grouped into relationships.

pricing_plans.description: Custom plan that comes with SSO, custom branding, HIPAA compliance, and more.

attributes.name: Custom Response Limits & Seats for All Your Team

_source.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
_source.long_desc: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.
_source.pricing_details:
Free Plan: free to collect 100 responses per month with typeforms of up to 10 fields.

Basic: $29/month (or $25/month when billed annually) to collect up to 100 responses from unlimited typeforms.

Plus: $59/month (or $50/month when billed annually) to collect up to 1,000 responses from unlimited typeforms + everything in Basic, remove Typeform branding, custom domain, and more.

Business: starting at $99/month (or $83/month when billed annually) to collect up to 10,000 responses from unlimited typeforms + everything in Plus, drop-off rates, priority support, and more.

Other paid plan features include Logic Jumps, respondent email notifications, hidden fields, and online payment collection.
_source.target_audience: SMBs, Large Enterprises, Design Enthusiasts, NGOs, Market Research Companies, Freelancers

category_features.definition: Offers more than one survey distribution channel (email, web link, social media, etc.) .

category_features.name: Multi-Language
category_features.definition: Recognize and support multiple languages/dialects

category_features.name: NPS of Customers
category_features.definition: Calculate NPS of customers

category_features.name: NPS of Employees
category_features.definition: Calculate NPS of employess

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Pulse Surveys
category_features.definition: Surveys sent out at regularly scheduled intervals to track important metrics like job satisfaction, work environment, etc

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Text Analysis
category_features.definition: Process of extracting and classifying information from text, such as tweets, emails, product reviews, etc

category_features.name: Text Fields
category_features.definition: Open text box field

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Survey Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated

similar_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
similar_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.

pricing_plans.description: The plan includes unlimited typeforms and questions. The Basic plan is available at $25/month when billed annually (16% discount).

pricing_plans.description: The plan comes with 1000 monthly responses, 3 users, custom subdomain, and more. The Plus plan costs $50/month when billed annually (16% savings).

pricing_plans.description: The plan comes with 5 users, 10,000 monthly responses, priority support, and more. The business plan is available for $83/monthly with annual billing (discount of 16%).
